description: The Samastipur RTO (BR-33) serves as the primary District Transport Office for Samastipur in Bihar, operating under the Darbhanga administrative division. It is responsible for vehicle registration, driving license issuance, and road tax collection for one of North Bihar's most populous districts, known for its strategic importance as a major railway hub and agricultural center. The office governs transport regulations across its diverse jurisdiction, which includes 20 administrative blocks and several urban centers.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Uttarayan, Kasipur, Samastipur, Bihar
